# adlgraphs

## Overview

The goal of adlgraphs is to to help ensure that the data visualizations
produced by the Center for Antisemitism Research (CAR) at the Anti-Defamation 
League (ADL) are consistent with ADL's brand guidelines and that CAR's 
data visualizations are consistent and cohesive.

## Installation

You can install the development version of adlgraphs from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("pak")
pak::pak("JDenn0514/adlgraphs")
```
